title.value: Study of common bean (Phaseolus vulgaris L.) germplasm under complex of morphological traits
Изучение коллекционных образцов фасоли обыкновенной (Phaseolus vulgaris L.)по комплексу идентификационных признаков

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Semashko, T.V., State Inspection for Testing and Protection of Plant Varieties of Belarus (Belarus)
Vasilevskaya, T.I., State Agricultural Agency 'Kobrin Variety Testing Station', Kobrin (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on creating national collections of standards varieties of common bean (Phaseolus vulgaris). In course of the study there were realized the following activities: collection, storage and study of introduction of a wide range of collection varieties of common bean of different origin; evaluation of a complex of traits in collection common bean varieties for creation of UPOV-descriptions of the studied samples in accordance with the procedure UPOV TG/12/9 by the standard characteristics; selection of candidates for the national grade-standards; analysis of a complex of the identification traits of candidates for the varieties of common bean standards to minimize the number of varieties in the collection. As a result of long-term field and laboratory tests of more than 1 500 common bean varieties of 48 traits (173 states of expression of characters in the aggregate) the 99 varieties were included into the national germplasm collection of example varieties. These varieties are recommended to be used in national DUS-testing system and PBR granting.
